Title: Relates to the disclosure by hotels of contracts or similar agreements providing rooms to eligible homeless persons or families
Summary: Relates to the disclosure by hotels of contracts or similar agreements providing rooms to eligible homeless persons or families.
LawCode: Add ยง206-g, Gen Bus L
